name: Terriers
summary: Terriers, from creator/executive producer Ted Griffin and executive producer Shawn Ryan is a comedic drama starring Donal Logue and Michael Raymond-James. It centers on "Hank Dolworth" , an ex-cop who partners with his best friend "Britt Pollack" to launch an unlicensed private investigation business. The duo, both struggling with maturity issues, solve crimes while avoiding danger and responsibility.
